task.title: Registering for an Event through the Shopping Cart
task.abstract: Staff users can register event attendees through the backend Shopping Cart. Best practices recommend using the Shopping Cart for backend group registration.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Sales Order tab within the eBusiness app and click New to create a new Sales Order.
Select the Contact from the lookup, Receipt as the Posting Entity, and Simple Receipt as the Schedule Type. Click the Save button.
Click the Shopping Cart button on the Sales Order record.
step.info: If the Shopping Cart button is not present on the Sales Order record, create a new button.

step.cmd: Select the Events checkbox in the Filter Results sidebar. Search for the event schedule item and/or ticket type and click the Shopping Cart icon to add the item to the Shopping Cart.
step.info: If the ticket type has a form attachment, click the Interview tab to complete the attached set of interview questions along with any requested information. Click the Submit button.

step.cmd: Review the field values in the Price and Quantity tab and click the Save button to preserve any changes.
Click the Checkout button if there are no other backend registrations.
step.info: Select the correct Payment Gateway and complete the required payment information. Click Pay.
Add another ticket for the additional attendee to the Shopping Cart.

choices.choice: Use the lookup to select an existing Contact
Enter the attendees name and click the lookup icon to create a new Contact record

step.info: Click the New button, enter any additional information, and click Save.

step.cmd: Enter any necessary changes to the Sales Order and click Save.
Click Checkout, select the correct Payment Gateway and complete the required payment information. Click Pay.

taskbody.result: Registration for a ticket type and/or schedule item is successful upon payment. Assignment records are created for additional attendees.Additional attendees will not receive any event related emails.
